message: Bob, I'm offering you my product at a price of $1200000. This is a significant investment, but I believe it will be very profitable for you.  I'm open to discussing a reasonable counteroffer if this isn't the right starting point for you.
Alice, thanks for the offer. While I appreciate the potential of the product, $1200000 is a bit higher than my budget allows. I'm willing to pay $800000 for it.  Let me know what you think.
